name: Evoke
description: A VR spell-casting experience! Greyhelm forest is on the verge of being completely corrupted by the undead, this looks like a job for an almighty and powerful wizard! Oh, he's booked out is he? Damn.. Well, perhaps you will be up for the challenge!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
